title: The Worst Piece of Legislation I’ve Ever Seen (Ep 1473)
description:
In this episode, I discuss the most destructive piece of legislation I’ve seen in decades. This bill will make it impossible for conservatives to win any elections in the future. I also address a potential big break in the Spygate scandal. 

News Picks:


Insane things tucked into the HR 1 elections bill. 


Biden can’t remember the name of his own Secretary of Defense. 

Again! There is NO evidence of Russian “collusion.” 


A win for free speech on college campuses.

Is the inflation menace peeking its ugly head?


An optimistic note about American education?


Copyright Bongino Inc All Rights Reserved.
